foo
----
application/datalog
source{char: "f", id: 0}.
source{char: "o", id: 1}.
source{char: "o", id: 2}.
next{left: 0, right: 1}.
next{left: 1, right: 2}.
next{left: 2, right: "end"}.

foobar
----
application/datalog
source{char: "f", id: 0}.
source{char: "o", id: 1}.
source{char: "o", id: 2}.
source{char: "b", id: 3}.
source{char: "a", id: 4}.
source{char: "r", id: 5}.
next{left: 0, right: 1}.
next{left: 1, right: 2}.
next{left: 2, right: 3}.
next{left: 3, right: 4}.
next{left: 4, right: 5}.
next{left: 5, right: "end"}.
